titleStmt.title: The Dangerous imposture of Quakerism represented in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Jeffery, John, 1647-1720.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to John Jeffrey.

This item appears as D198 Variant (Wing 1st ed.) at reel 888:22, and as J514B (Wing 2nd ed.) at reel 1387:13. Copy at reel 888:22 has t.p., includes "The true nature and pernicious consequences of canting about religion", and has been cataloged separately.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
